ISTAT SDMX Web Service Configuration

Source: R/config.R
istat_config.Rd

Centralized configuration for ISTAT SDMX web service endpoints and settings. This provides a single source of truth for API URLs and service parameters.

Developed by Giampaolo Montaletti.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
